author: bundocka
body: There appears to be a run 272133 where the firmware version was updated, but the additional output required by the versioned unpacker is not present in the readout. This was during commissioning of the Stage 2 trigger. I've added a check that makes sure the unpacker doesn't go outside the block length.
title: L1T CaloL2: Fix MPUnpacker so that it does not go out of range for old test run
